channel.title: The REAL rapture/apocalypse/new beginning (as defined by me)
channel.description:
ever few seasons (thousands of years) a new god takes control of the earth. as some of you may know, Satan has won the war with god and sometime in the next 50 years (i believe its going to be 2017) as explained in the last book of the bible, god will kill all who have repented and take them to heaven, (1/3 of the population) and then Satan will take control of the Earth, as i believe (through thoughts beng placed in my mind by Satan(as i think)) Satan will find all loyal Satanists and put them in control of all who are Christian/Catholic/Jewish/whatever/etc. and somehting will happen (im not sure at this time)
that is what i believe is going to happen
BTW: i believe its 2017 because that is when all of the mayan calendars end. which means a new beginning?
DISCUSS what you believe is going to happen

item.title: The REAL rapture/apocalypse/new beginning (as defined by me)
item.dc:creator: @dragonus18 dragonus18
item.description:
@dragonus18 wrote:

Schizzo:

How seriously am I actually supposed to take a Satanists view on Christianity? Honestly.

not a satanists view, just get rid of all your prejudices on satanism.

ThAt0n36Uy:

You don’t, it’s all bullshit, You don’t need a shut mind to see that either. Dragonus, grow a brain of your own, quit doing what everyone else does, it makes you look like a bigger loser, I doubt you’re even a Satanist.

how am i doing what everyone else does, and i have my own brain.

Read full topic

item.dc:creator: @dragonus18 dragonus18
item.description:
@dragonus18 wrote:

[quote=“The Un-Named, post:17, topic:149068”][quote author=dragonus18 link=topic=204359.msg1814172#msg1814172 date=1191997509]

Right, so why would god kill people? His son died for people’s sins, why is he going from a state to letting his SON die for other people to killing them?

it’s in the bible dude, you can ask god that when you die, (if he gives a shit which he won’t)
[/quote]

Did you know, almost all of the 10 Commandments have Egyptian roots in The Book of The Dead, their from The Hall of Judgment, the 42 Negative Confessions? The Egyptians believed, if you do good in the world, you will be rewarded in the next, and passing all trials of the underworld, you will be rewarded in the Field of Reeds, almost like how Christians go to Heaven.[/quote]
did you know that the egyptians worshipped ENKI which is also satan? a lot of religions worshipped satan at that time, and i think you would love this, http://www1.freewebs.com/see_the_truth/

and the only reason i am quoting the bible is ebcause most of these forums are christian, and believe eveerything in the bible word for word, i am a satanist myself.

Read full topic

You should actually try reading the claims Doctors have made about the Rapture of Gods children, the apocalypse is not even remotely connected with the Rapture. Your new definition is a load of Bullshit.
